nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
### Add chat ID
Remember to set your actual ID to trigger automation from Telegram.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
### Ignore start message
Workflow ignores initial`/start` message sent to the bot.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
### Download resume file
Based on file ID, node performs downloading of the file uploaded by user.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note4

parameters.content:
### Extract text from PDF
Node extracts readable text form PDF.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note5

parameters.content:
### Parse resume data
Create structured data from text extracted from resume. Chain uses OpenAI `gpt-4-turbo-preview` model and JSON response mode. **Adjust JSON schema in output parser to your needs.**

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Parse resume data

messageValues.message: Your task is to extract all necessary data such as first name, last name, experience, known technologies etc. from the provided resume text and return in well-unified JSON format. Do not make things up.

nodes.notes: This chainLlm node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Merge other data
nodes.notes: This merge node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note6

parameters.content:
### Format HTML
Format HTML for each resume section (employment history, projects etc.).

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note7

parameters.content:
### Create HTML file
From formatted output create `index.html` file in order to run PDF conversion.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note8

parameters.content:
### Convert file to PDF
Form `index.html` create PDF using [Gotenberg]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} If you're not familiar with this software, feel free to check out [my tutorial on YouTube]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note9

parameters.content:
### Send PDF file to user
Deliver converted PDF to Telegram user (based on chat ID).

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Lmchatopenai Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Lmchatopenai Workflow. This workflow integrates 16 different services: convertToFile, telegramTrigger, httpRequest, stickyNote, telegram. It contains 52 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 52
- **Node Types**: 16
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **OpenAI Chat Model**: lmChatOpenAi
- **Convert education to HTML**: code
- **Auto-fixing Output Parser**: outputParserAutofixing
- **OpenAI Chat Model1**: lmChatOpenAi
- **Structured Output Parser**: outputParserStructured
- **Convert employment history to HTML**: code
- **Convert projects to HTML**: code
- **Convert volunteering to HTML**: code
- **Telegram trigger**: telegramTrigger
- **Auth**: if
- ... and 42 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.
